item.title: gitIntroduction
item.description: git学习 git 区域概念 git分为工作区(我们自己的file)和版本库这其中版本库又包含暂存区(Stage)和分支区(master) git add ********** 把文件

item.title: gitub配置
item.description: zhou@zhou-Lenovo-Z480:~$ git version git version 2.7.4 zhou@zhou-Lenovo-Z480:~$ ssh -T git@github.com Warning: Permanently added the RSA host key for IP address '192.30.255.112' to the list of known hosts. Permission denied (publickey). zhou@zhou-Lenovo-Z480:~$ git config --global user.name "zhouchenhua" zhou@zhou-Lenovo-Z480:~$ git config --global user.email "noatnu@163.com" zhou@zhou-Lenovo-Z480:~$ git config --list user.name=zhouchenhua user.email=noatnu@163.com zhou@zhou-Lenovo-Z480:~$ ssh-keygen -C ‘noatnu@163.com’ -t rsa Generating
